page.title: 20THE FUTURE OF THE AREA
page.content:
In the future all the wetland will have been drained and turned into crop fields. There will be more modernisation of the farms and houses and probably there will be more private dwellings built in and around Fenwick.
This work has been compiled by{Class {3T}of Sutton Road Middle School, Askern. The members of the class are Christina Morgan, Joanne Ascough,Lynne Thomas, Mark Blanchon, Helen Hazell, Samantha Horne, Natalia Horton, Elizabeth Ridley, Helen Adams, David McAvoy, Paul Mewse, Deborah Jackson, Paula Wainwright, Paula Griffiths, Claire Jameson, Helen Hasle,Graham Poole,Scott McMurtrie, Debbie Ackroyd, Scott Leadbitter, Michael McNicol, Ian Smith, Sarah Farrar and Pauline Thompson (teacher).
